title: Still impressive
text: Amazing what humans were capable of building over 2000 ago. The view is stunning by the way and you should definitely take the short hike up. Enriches the experience in general.

title: Great food and service
text: We tried the butter chicken and Lamb Saag with Raita, garlic Nan, natural Nan and a magical mangolassi. Enjoyed every bite. Can really recommend this restaurant.
